subject: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
Boxing
lead_paragraph: The boxing champion Manny Pacquiao and his associates tried to quell an uproar incited by an article on a Web site that addressed his opposition to same-sex marriage.
snippet: The boxing champion Manny Pacquiao and his associates tried to quell an uproar incited by an article on a Web site that addressed his opposition to same-sex marriage.
